meanings.definition: Having the most money or resources
meanings.sent1: She felt the flushest when she won the lottery.
meanings.sent2: The wealthiest person in town lived in the flushest mansion.
meanings.sent3: The flushest man in the village was known for his generosity.
meanings.sent4: His bank account was the flushest among all his friends.
meanings.sent5: The flushest family in the neighborhood always drove luxury cars.

meanings.definition: To become red in the face due to embarrassment or anger
meanings.sent1: He flushest every time he was caught telling a lie.
meanings.sent2: She flushest whenever someone mentioned her embarrassing moment.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke made the audience flushest with laughter.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks flushest with anger as he argued with his brother.
meanings.sent5: The child flushest when caught sneaking cookies before dinner.

meanings.definition: To clean or rinse something thoroughly
meanings.sent1: She flushest the dishes until they sparkled.
meanings.sent2: The car wash service flushest every vehicle inside out.
meanings.sent3: He flushest his sneakers after a muddy hike.
meanings.sent4: The maid flushest the windows until they gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The river flushest away all the dirt and debris after the heavy rain.
